text:
Hi,
I'm receiving the following error in the CLI:
Redacted@Redacteds-Air domoIntegration % hs secrets add REDACTED
? Enter a value for your secret:  REDACTED
[ERROR] The secret "REDACTED" was not added
[ERROR] The post to 'add secret' in account REDACTED was forbidden. This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.
- One or more of the following scopes are required.

No scopes are listed, nor does it seem like scopes should be necessary in the cli. It seems like it would be my permissions that should be changed. Am I wrong about this?
Hello - Can someone please confirm that a Content Hub Enterprise is required in order to setup a Reverse Proxy? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/reverse-proxy-support>

Hello! Is there a way that I can sync survey responses that are tagged to contacts in HubSpot to a custom object in Salesforce? I am trying to set up unidirectional sync for survey responses from HubSpot to Salesforce as the survey is setup in HubSpot.
